snippet: The authorities in Bergen County, N.J., believe the attack may be linked to the firebombing of a synagogue in Paramus last week.
abstract: Molotov cocktail is thrown into home of Rabbi Nosson Schuman, where he lives with his family in Rutherford, NJ; authorities believe the attack may be linked to an earlier firebombing of a synagogue in Paramus; authorities are also investigating two cases from December of swastikas being found on Bergen County synagogues for possible links.

byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and NATE SCHWEBER
byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein reported from New York, and Nate Schweber from Rutherford, N.J.

lead_paragraph: The authorities in Bergen County, N.J., believe the attack may be linked to the firebombing of a synagogue in Paramus last week.

headline.seo: Molotov Cocktail Thrown Into the Home of a Rabbi
headline.main: Molotov Cocktail Thrown Into the Home of a Rabbi
headline.print_headline: Molotov Cocktail Thrown Into the Home of a Rabbi
